thread.title: Two Warring Factions of New York’s Senate Democrats to Sit Together Again

author: Mike Vilensky
title: Two Warring Factions of New York’s Senate Democrats to Sit Together Again
text:
Two warring factions of Democrats in New York’s state Senate are expected to sit as one group on Tuesday, ending seven years of party warfare that helped Republicans gain power in a largely Democratic state.
Eight senators in 2012 broke off to form a bipartisan majority coalition with Republicans, but on Monday the Senate passed a measure to expand the rolls of the Senate Democratic Conference as the eight returned.
...
